矮.definition: (of a person) short; (of a wall etc) low; (of rank) inferior (to); lower (than)

矮個兒.definition: a person of short stature; a short person

矮化.definition: (plant pathology) to become stunted; (horticulture) to dwarf; to reduce in size (by pruning, breeding etc); (fig.) to diminish the status of; to disparage; (fig.) to downplay

矮半截.definition: to be inferior to; to be of a lower grade than

矮子裡拔將軍.pinyin: ai3 zi5 li5 ba2 jiang1 jun1
矮子裡拔將軍.definition: lit. choose a general from among the dwarfs; fig. choose the best person available (out of a mediocre bunch)

矮小.definition: short and small; low and small; undersized

矮油.definition: (slang) alternative for 哎呦[ai1 you1] "oh my!"

矮腳白花蛇利草.pinyin: ai3 jiao3 bai2 hua1 she2 li4 cao3
矮腳白花蛇利草.definition: see 白花蛇舌草[bai2 hua1 she2 she2 cao3]

矮腳苦蒿.definition: see 熊膽草|熊胆草[xiong2 dan3 cao3]

矮醜窮.definition: (Internet slang) (of a man) unmarriageable (lit. short, ugly and poor); opposite: 高富帥|高富帅[gao1 fu4 shuai4]

矮黑人.definition: black dwarf (pejorative term for non-Han people)
